snippet: Wei Chu Hu was ordered to be held without bail on Saturday in the blaze that killed a woman and severely damaged an apartment building in the NoLIta neighborhood.
abstract: Wei Chu Hu is ordered to be held without bail in blaze that killed a woman and severely damaged an apartment building in the NoLIta neighborhood; he is charged with murder, arson and assault.

byline.original: By COLIN MOYNIHAN and JULIE TURKEWITZ

lead_paragraph: Wei Chu Hu was ordered to be held without bail on Saturday in the blaze that killed a woman and severely damaged an apartment building in the NoLIta neighborhood.

headline.seo: Suspect Arraigned in Fatal Manhattan Fire
headline.main: At Arraignment, Account of a Threat Before a Fatal Fire
headline.print_headline: At Arraignment, Account of a Threat Before a Fatal Fire
